snippet: Natalia Alaverdian, a fashion director for the Russian edition of Harper’s Bazaar, is part of a pack of young women from that country who have made a big impression on the industry.
abstract: Natalia Alaverdian, a fashion director for Russian edition of Harper’s Bazaar, launches her own fashion label, Awake, which features bold graphic giraffe prints.
lead_paragraph: Natalia Alaverdian, a fashion director for the Russian edition of Harper’s Bazaar, is part of a pack of young women from that country who have made a big impression on the industry.
